event: Sri Gaura Purnima paran. Anandotsav of Sri Jagannath Mishra. Last gathering of the week-long yearly meeting at Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math and yearly festival.

Festival at the appearance place of Srila Bhakti Raksak Sridhar Dev-Goswami Maharaj, Sripat Hapaniya: grand appearance of the Holy Deities of Sripat Hapaniya, Sri Sri Guru Gauranga Radha Gopinath Jiu at Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Ashram. Appearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Sharan Shanta Maharaj. Pancham Dol
Appearance of Srila Srivas Pandit
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Vigraha Bhiksu Goswami Maharaj
Festival in honour of Sriman Mahaprabhu\'s auspicious arrival at Varaha Nagar. Disappearance of Srila Govinda Ghosh Thakur. Disappearance of Sripad Satyendrachandra Bhattacharya Mahoday
Appearance of Sripad Ramanuja Acharya and Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Hriday Bon Maharaj
Appearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Vilas Tirtha Maharaj
Sri Rama Navami. Fast until noon. Appearance at noon of Sri Ramachandra
Festival in honour of the disappearance of Omvishnupad Paramahamsa Parivrajakacharya-varya Ashtottara-shata-sri Srila Bhakti Sundar Govinda Dev-Goswami Maharaj
Vasanta Rasa of Sri Krishna. Rasa Yatra of Sri Balaram. Appearance of Srila Vamshi Vadanananda Thakur and Srila Shyamananda Prabhu
Disappearance of Sripad Krishnadas Babaji Maharaj
Disappearance of Srila Abhiram Thakur
Disappearance of Srila Vrindavan Das Thakur
Disappearance of Sriyukta Saurindranath Bhakti Varidhi Prabhu
Appearance of Srila Gadadhar Pandit Goswami
Appearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Aloka Paramahamsa Maharaj
Appearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Vichar Jajavar Maharaj
Beginning of 21 days Chandan Yatra of Sri Sri Jagannathdev. Aksaya Tritiya: a good day to start some works
Appearance of Sripad Shankar Acharya. Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Vilas Gabhastinemi Maharaj
Jahnu Saptami. Sri Jahnavi Puja (Sri Ganga Puja)
Appearance of Sri Nityananda-shakti, Sri Jahnava Devi, and Sri Rama-shakti, Sri Sita Devi. Appearance of Srila Bhakti Sudhir Goswami Maharaj
Sri Nrisimha Chaturdashi: appearance day of Sri Nrisimhadev. Full fast until after sunset, then no grains (anukalpa),

Sri Nrisimha Chaturdashi paran between 5:03 and 9:23 a.m. Sri Krishna\'s Phul Dol and Salila Bihar. Buddha Purnima: appearance day of Lord Buddha. Disappearance of Srila Parameshvari Das Thakur. Appearance of Srila Srinivas Acharya
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Saranga Goswami Maharaj
Disappearance of Srila Ramananda Ray
Appearance of Srila Vrindavan Das Thakur
Sree Chaitanya Saraswata Krishnanushilana Sangha, Dum Dum ParK, Kolkata: Sri Sri Guru Gauranga Radha Madan Mohan Jiu\'s installation day festival
Disappearance of Srila Bhakti Gaurava Giri Maharaj (Sripad Paramananda Vidyaratna Prabhu)
Dashahara. Sri Ganga Puja. Appearance of Sri Ganga Mata Goswamini. Disappearance of Srila Baladev Vidyabhushan Prabhu
Grand festival of Srila Raghunath Das Goswami at Sripat Panihati
Snan Yatra (bathing of Sri Jagannathdev). Disappearance of Srila Mukunda Datta and Srila Sridhar Pandit
Disappearance of Srila Shyamananda Prabhu and Sripad Rishabdev Das Adhikari
Disappearance of Sri Gaurahari Bhakti Sampad Prabhu
Appearance of Srila Vakreshvar Pandit
Disappearance of Sriyukta Rama Devi
Disappearance of Srila Gadadhar Pandit and Srila Sachchidananda Bhakti Vinod Thakur. Gundicha Marjan: cleaning at the Gundicha Temple at Sri Puri Dham, and cleaning of all Temples of the Lord,
Ratha Yatra of Sri Jagannathdev
Disappearance of Srila Svarupdamodar Goswami Prabhu
Hera Panchami. Sri Sri Laksmi Vijay (observed the following day in Sri Puri Dham)
Disappearance of Sripad Ajita Krishna Brahmachari
Punar Yatra of Sri Jagannathdev (Return car festival. Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Bhakti Kamal Madhusudan Maharaj). Disappearance of Sriyukta Krishnamayi Devi

Sri Guru Purnima. Appearance of Srila Vyasadev. Disappearance of Srila Sanatan Goswami Prabhu. Beginning of Chaturmasya (when started on Purnima as followed in Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math. Appearance of Srila Bhakti Bimal Avadhut Maharaj)
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Hriday Bon Maharaj
Disappearance of Srila Gopal Bhatta Goswami Prabhu
Disappearance of Srila Lokanath Goswami Prabhu
Festival in honour of the disappearance of Omvishnupad Paramahamsa Parivrajakacharya-varya Ashtottara-shata-sri Srila Bhakti Raksak Sridhar Dev-Goswami Maharaj
Disappearance of Srila Vamshi Das Babaji Maharaj
Appearance of Srila Bhakti Vijaytrivikram Maharaj
Disappearance of Sripad Ananga Mohan Das Adhikari
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Bhakti Prasun Bodhayan Maharaj
Beginning of Jhulan Yatra of Sri Sri Radha-Govinda and start of the one month festival of Sri Hari Smaran at Nabadwip, Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math,
Disappearance of Srila Rupa Goswami and Srila Gauri Das Pandit Goswami
Appearance of Sri Baladev. Fast until noon. End of Jhulan Yatra of Sri Sri Radha-Govinda
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Bhakti Vilas Tapasvi Maharaj
Sri Sri Krishna Janmashtami. Complete fast until midnight,then no grains
Sri Nandotsav. Sri Janmashtami paran. Appearance of Vishva-varenya Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhaktivedanta Swami Maharaj Prabhupad
Appearance of Sri Sita Devi, the consort of Sri Advaita Prabhu,
Sri Lalita Saptami. Appearance of Sri Lalita Devi
Sri Radhashtami. Srimati Radharani\'s appearance at noon. Fast until noon
Appearance of Sri Vamanadev. Appearance of Srila Jiva Goswami Prabhu
Appearance of Srila Sachchidananda Bhakti Vinod Thakur
Disappearance of Srila Haridas Thakur
Vishvarup Mahotsav. End of month-long festival at Nabadwip, Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math,
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Vilas Tirtha Maharaj
Appearance festival of Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math Acharya and Sevaite Srila Bhakti Nirmal Acharya Maharaj
Disappearance of Sriyukta Radharani Devi Chaudurani
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Sripad Bhakti Dayitadamodar Maharaj
Vijay Utsav of Sri Ramachandra. Appearance of Sri Madhva Acharya
Disappearance of Srila Raghunath Das Goswami, Srila Raghunath Bhatta Goswami, and Srila Krishnadas Kaviraj Goswami

Sharadiya Rasa Yatra of Sri Krishna. Disappearance of Srila Murari Gupta. Beginning of Urja Vrata,damodar Vrata, Kartik Vrata and Niyam-seva Vrata if begun from the purnima day, as followed in Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Srirup Puri Maharaj
Disappearance of Srila Narottam Das Thakur
Disappearance of Srila Bhakti Vichar Jajavar Maharaj
Bahulashtami. Manifestation day of Sri Radha Kunda. Sannyas day of Srila Bhakti Sundar Govinda Dev-Goswami Maharaj

The grand 123nd appearance day celebration of Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math\'s Founder-President-Acharya, Omvishnupad Paramahamsa Parivrajakacharya-varya Ashtottara-shata-sri Srila Bhakti Raksak Sridhar Dev-Goswami Maharaj. Appearance of Srila Virachandra Prabhu. Disappearance of Sripad Sakhi Charan Das Babaji Maharaj
Festival in honour of Sri Gauranga Mahaprabhu\'s auspicious arrival at Sripat Panihati
Offering and placing of lamps (or candles on Vishnu Mandirs)
Dipavali. Offering and placing of lamps (or candles on Vishnu Mandirs)

Sri Govardhan Puja. Grand Annakut Mahotsav (\'Rice Mountain Festival\') at Srila Sridhar Swami Seva Ashram in Sri Govardhan and in the Temple in Sri Gupta Govardhan. Go Puja (cow-worship and Go Krida (the pleasure of the cows))
Disappearance of Srila Vasudev Ghosh Thakur. Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Sarvasva Giri Maharaj. Bhratri Dvitiya krityam (festival where brothers and sisters honour each other)
Disappearance festival of Vishva-varenya Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhaktivedanta Swami Maharaj Prabhupad
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Aloka Paramahamsa Maharaj
Disappearance of Sri Gadadhar Das Goswami,Srila Dhananjay Pandit, and Srila Srinivas Acharya Prabhu. Sri Gopashtami, Sri Goshthastami, Go Puja, and Go Gras-dan
Disappearance of Omvishnupad Paramahamsa Sri Srila Gaura Kishor Das Babaji Maharaj. Appearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Dayita Madhav Goswami Maharaj. Sri Bhishma Panchaka
Disappearance of Srila Bhugarbha Goswami and Srila Kashishvar Pandit

Rasa Yatra of Sri Krishna. Installation anniversary of Sri Sri Guru Gauranga Gandharva Rasa Bihari Jiu, Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math and Mission, Sri Vrindavan. Disappearance of Srila Sundarananda Thakur. Appearance of Srila Nimbarka Acharya. End of Chaturmasya and Niyama-seva vratas when began from Purnima (as in Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math)
Disappearance of Srila Narahari Sarkar Thakur and Srila Kaliya Krishnadas. Disappearance of Sriyukta Dhananjay Das Prabhu
Disappearance of Srila Saranga Thakur
Disappearance of Srila Jagabandhu Bhakti Ranjan
Oran Shashthi. Grand festival for honouring the appearance of Sri Sri Nitai-Chaitanya Jiu at Sri Puri Dham, Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math
Disappearance of Srila Madhusudan Das Babaji Maharaj
Appearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Kamal Madhusudan Maharaj
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Kusum Shraman Maharaj
The grand 89th appearance day celebration of Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math\'s Sevaite-President-Acharya, Omvishnupad Paramahamsa Parivrajakacharya Sri Srimad Bhakti Sundar Govinda Dev-Goswami Maharaj
Festivals at the appearance place of Srila B.S. Govinda Dev-Goswami Maharaj and his youth Pastimes place: Bamunpara and Nadan Ghat
Disappearance festival of the founder of the Sri Chaitanya Math and worldwide Sri Gaudiya Maths, Bhagavan Sri Srila Bhakti Siddhanta Saraswati Goswami Prabhupad
Disappearance of Srila Devananda Pandit and Srimad Bhakti Prakash Aranya Maharaj
Disappearance of Sripad Bhakti Bhudev Shrauti Maharaj
Disappearance of Srila Mahesh Pandit and Srila Uddharan Das Thakur
Appearance of Srila Lochan Das Thakur
Disappearance of Srila Jiva Goswami Prabhu and Srila Jagadish Pandit
Appearance of Srila Jagadish Pandit
Pushyabhisheka Yatra of Sri Krishna. Disappearance of Sripad Bhakti Sharan Vaisnava Maharaj
Appearance of Srila Gopal Bhatta Goswami Prabhu. Disappearance of Srila Ramachandra Kaviraj
Disappearance of Sripad Yadavendu Bhakti Chandan
Disappearance of Srila Jayadev Goswami
Disappearance of Srila Lochan Das Thakur
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Gaurava Vaikhanas Maharaj. Disappearance of Sri Haripada Chaudhuri Das Adhikari
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Sharan Shanta Maharaj
Appearance of Srila Bhakti Pavan Janardan Maharaj

Sri Krishna Vasanta Panchami. Appearance day of Srivishnu Priya Devi. Appearance of Srila Pundarik Vidyanidhi, Srila Raghunath Das Goswami, and Srila Raghu ,Nandan Thakur. Disappearance of Srila Visvanath Chakravarti Thakur, Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Viveka Bharati Maharaj, and Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Svarup Parvat Maharaj. Sri Saraswati Puja
Appearance of Mahavishnu Avatar, Sri Advaita Acharya
Disappearance of Sripad Virendra Krishna Prabhu
Disappearance of Srila Madhva Acharya
Disappearance of Srila Ramanuja Acharya
Varaha Dvadashi. Appearance of Lord Varaha
Appearance of Sri Nityananda Prabhu. Grand festival and installation anniversary of Sri Sri Guru Gaura Nityananda Jiu at Sree Chaitanya Saraswata Krishnanushilana Sangha, Ekachakra Dham,
Sri Krishna\'s Madhurotsav. Appearance of Srila Narottam Das Thakur
Disappearance of Tridandi Swami Sripad Bhakti Premik Siddhanti Maharaj

The 145th divine appearance festival of the founder of the Sri Chaitanya Math and worldwide Sri Gaudiya Maths, Bhagavan Sri Srila Bhakti Siddhanta Saraswati Goswami Prabhupad. Anniversary festival of the installation of Sri Gupta Govardhan Sri Mandir, Sri Govinda Kunda, Nabadwip. Disappearance of Srila Purushottam Thakur
Appearance of Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Saranga Goswami Maharaj
Disappearance of Sripad Krishna Govinda Das Adhikari
Sri Sri Shivaratri (optional fast). Disappearance of Sri Yudhamanyu Prabhu Seva Vikram
Paran between 6:15 and 9:59 a.m. for those who fasted. Anniversary festival of the installation of Sri Sadashiva Gangadhar, Sri Govinda Kunda, Nabadwip
Disappearance of Vaishnava Sarvabhauma Srila Jagannath Das Babaji Maharaj, Srila Rasikananda Dev Goswami, and Tridandi Swami Srimad Bhakti Dayita Madhav Maharaj
Appearance of Srila Bhakti Kusum Ashram Maharaj
Sri Sri Guru Gauranga Gandharva Radha Ramanasundar Jiu installation anniversary festival, at Sree Chaitanya Saraswata Krishnanushilana Sangha, Kaikhali, Kolkata
Appearance of Srila Purushottam Thakur. Disappearance of Sripad Tulasidas Das Adhikari Prabhu
Disappearance of Sriyukta Tarangini Devi
Adhivas festival of Sri Nabadwip Dham Parikrama. Beginning of annual seven day festival

Sri Nabadwip Dham Parikrama begins. Parikrama of Sri Ishodyan, Sri Yoga Pith (Sriman Mahaprabhu\'s appearance place, Srivas Angan, Sri Nrisimha Mandir, Sri Advaita Bhavan, Murari Gupta Bhavan, Sri Chaitanya Math, the Temple of Sri Sri Gandharvika-Giridhari and Sriman Mahaprabhu surrounded by the Acharyas of the four Vaishnava sampradayas, Srila Prabhupad\'s Samadhi Mandir, Srila Gaura Kishor Das Babaji Maharaj\'s Samadhi, Sri Kazi Samadhi, Sharadanga Sri Jagannath Mandir, Sridhar Angan, Sri Simantadwip, Sri Rudradwip, and Sri Antardwip)

Disappearance of Sripad Madhavendra Puri. Parikrama of Praudha Maya, Vriddha Shiva, Srivishnu Priya\'s Deity of Sri Gauranga, Sri Jagannath Das Babaji Maharaj\'s Samadhi Mandir, Sri Koladwip, and other places
Parikrama of Sri Godrumadwip and Madhyadwip, Sri Surabhi Kunj, Suvarna Bihar Math, Sri Nrisimha Palli, Sri Harihara Ksetra, and other places

Adhivas observance ceremony of the appearance of Sri Gauranga. Parikrama of Sri Koladwip, Sri Ritudwip, Sri Jahnudwip, Sri Modadrumadwip, Old Sri Sri Gaura-Gadadhar Mandir, Vidya Nagar Sarvabhauma Gaudiya Math, Srila Vrindavan Das Thakur\'s appearance place, and the Deity served by Sri Saranga Murari and Vasudev Datta Thakur

Sri Gaura Purnima. Divine appearance of Sri Gauranga. Total fast until moonrise, then no grains. Grand festival at Sri Chaitanya Saraswat Math. Vasantotsav and Dol Yatra of Sri Sri Radha-Govinda. Special offering of worship and arati. Sri Chaitanya-charitamrita reading and maha-sankirtan.
